section.title: Starplots
section.para: What do we need. We'll draw a star plot at each (x, y) location with axes for each orientation and signal scaled from -99 being 0 and -25 being the maximum. We want to scale the starplots so as to be able to differentiate aggregate signal for that. Perhaps we want to use the top 2 or 3 orientation - base station signals. Then we want to pick a maximum and minimum radius and use the aggregate signal scaled between these. We can do all these computations in R and then export information that Javascript can use to draw the starplot as the mouse moves over the points.
